semantics.label: Puzzle image
semantics.description: Image that the tiles should be cut from.

semantics.label: Tiles horizontally
semantics.description: Set how many puzzle tiles the jigsaw puzzle should have horizontally.

semantics.label: Tiles vertically
semantics.description: Set how many puzzle tiles the jigsaw puzzle should have vertically.

semantics.label: Sound settings
semantics.description: These options will let you set sound related options.

fields.label: Autoplay background music
fields.description: Try to autoplay background music. May not be possible depending on the browser's policy.

fields.label: Start puzzle
fields.description: Alternative sound to play when puzzle is started.

fields.label: Show hint
fields.description: Alternative sound to play when a hint is shown.

fields.label: Pick up puzzle tile
fields.description: Alternative sound to play when a puzzle tile is picked up.

fields.label: Drop puzzle tile
fields.description: Alternative sound to play when a puzzle tile is dropped (in a wrong spot).

fields.label: Drop puzzle tile correctly
fields.description: Alternative sound to play when a puzzle tile is dropped in the correct spot.

fields.label: Complete puzzle
fields.description: Alternative sound to play when a puzzle is completed.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Time limit
fields.description: Set an optional time limit in seconds.

fields.label: Style of the attention seeker
fields.description: Set the visual style of how to draw attention to a puzzle tile.

fields.label: Time interval
fields.description: Set how many seconds should pass before the user gets a signal to get his/her attention. Leave empty to not give a signal.

fields.label: Auto hint time interval
fields.description: Set how many seconds should pass before the user gets a hint automatically (not incrementing the hint counter). Leave empty to not show a hint automatically.

fields.label: Show faint background
fields.description: Show a faint version of the image in the background to indicate where a puzzle tile needs to go.

fields.label: Show puzzle outlines
fields.description: Show puzzle outlines to indicate where a puzzle tile needs to go.

fields.label: Sorting space
fields.description: Set how much space in percent should be attached next to the jigsaw puzzle for sorting the tiles.

fields.label: Use full area
fields.description: Set if initially the tiles should cover the complete area including the area where they need to be dropped.

fields.label: Randomizer pattern
fields.description: Set how the tiles' position should be randomized.

fields.label: Text for "No image" message
fields.default: There was no image given for this jigsaw puzzle.

fields.label: Text for "time limit" in xAPI description
Assistive technology description for "Complete" button
fields.default: Complete the puzzle. All tiles will be put to their correct position.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show hint" button
fields.default: Receive a visual hint to where a puzzle tile needs to go.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the puzzle. All puzzle tiles will be shuffled on the canvas.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Enter fullscreen button"
Assistive technology description for "Exit fullscreen button"
